portfolio.name: Coda Payments Marketing & Advertising
portfolio.description:
Marketing and advertising of Codapayments in South Korea.
Codapayments is the fastest growing unicorn startup in Singapore, valued at over 1 billion dollars. It provides game payment solutions for top games in the world.

The goal of this campaign was to promote Skillz Vault NFT collection by honoring top PUBG Mobile gamers.
AJ Marketing managed an influencer marketing campaign via YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Douyin.
Reaching over 40 million gamer audience.

description:
During our tenor working for well-reputed clients ranging from IT, telecom to retail companies in the UK, Singapore, Dubai, and Vietnam, Magister as a Marketing Outsourcing Company realizes a great potential. It is the desire to be bigger and better for every organization regardless of how big or small they are.

To leverage a business, it's not only the processes that need to be constantly improved. Knowledge and experience of selected individuals who work for the firm are also significant. Above all, Magister's ultimate mission is to help our international clients enhance strategic marketing endeavors which increase business efficiency.

With our multicultural team from Europe and South East Asia, Magister is proud to be a Vietnam-based agency that can provide cost-effective marketing solutions. We offer a wide range of marketing services, including Consulting, Brand Building, Organic SEO, Paid Media, and B2B Marketing. Having a Marketing Outsourcing Company, you will have peace of mind achieving desired results with minimal risk.
